info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lea County through 500 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Monument, or 18 miles southwest of Lovington, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
